description: A lightweight, versatile waterproof using Pertex Shield 2.5 Layer with recycled outer, a fluorocarbon free DWR, and a recycled membrane. Its recycled credentials plus a soft and comfortable handle, make this jacket ideal for hiking and hillwalking.
name: Rab Kangri GTX Jacket - Mens

specs.key: Main - Recycled 50D polyester 2.5L with polyester membrane / Pertex Shield/ 98 g/m²/ HH
